title: Awful Customer Support
body:
So my brother tried logging onto league and apparently his acct info was incorrect.  He tried to do the switch password and nothing, no email or anything.  He then tried contacting support and they are asking questions that would have required amazing memory or luck to guess properly.  Glad i got out of league a while ago and glad i did.  support has always been shitty and now they lost 2 players for sure.  means nothing i know, there's millions others but still.

oh, forgot to mention, they apparently allowed for acct information and email to be swapped without sending any conformation for the previous address.  good job Riot

replies.body: Account security is super important, so we take strict measures when assisting with recovery.  The questions being asked are required to ensure ownership of the account without shadow of a doubt.  For the protection of players, we want to be careful and make sure that the account is being recovered to the owner.  Any information your brother can add to help with verifying that ownership can go a long way (in his ticket).  He can also try using our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide to take steps on his own.  Also make sure that he's logged into the correct region!  Good luck!

Pretty hard for him to do any of this when all his information was changed apparently without him receiving any notification from you guys about the information changing yet he then has to provide you all with sufficient information to prove the account is his.  real bang up job.

There customer support is absolutely terrible. 
I have also contacted this terrible customer support, and they did not help for exactly 2 weeks and a half but I won't stop till I get my points or RP instead.

Please read my story with them. This is my thread, also make sure to vote for that poll.
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/iqZXVWww-terrible-customer-support

thank you.
